Articles.Content: Hi everyone im new around here and from what i have heard this is a good community to join and i hope that will meet tons of great people here.
First great person checking in. Lol, welcome to KSP and the forums! Do you have any questions you want answered? I'd be very happy to help
thanks for the reply. The only question i have is are there major topic that i should not talk about on the forms that you are aware of?
thanks for the reply. The only question i have is if there is any tpoics i should stay away from on the forums

Well probably some general no-no's for any forum are: religion, conspiracies, and you always want to review what you've typed, this can prevent people from reading it and perceiving you as a giant butt.

You can read SQUAD official post on forum rules, I believe it has some topics to avoid on the forum

Sorry for such a late reply, I haven't checked the forums in a while really hope this helped!

Best of luck in your KSP expeditions to the unknown
